CustomField.description: Uses a formula to calculate the total price of the product.
CustomField.formula: M_Net_Selling_Price_Calculated__c + M_Boat_Sales_Tax_Calculated__c + M_Trailer_Sales_Tax__c + M_Boat_Reg_Fee__c + M_Trailer_Reg_Fee__c + M_Doc_Fee__c + M_Trade_PayOFF__c
CustomField.label: Total Price (Calculated)
